      • loadStopForecast

        private void loadStopForecast(java.lang.String stopName,
                              boolean shouldShowSnackbar)
        Load the stop forecast for a particular stop.
        Parameters:
        stopName - The stop for which to load a stop forecast.
        shouldShowSnackbar - Whether or not we should show a Snackbar to the user with the API created time.

      • getApiCreatedTime

        private java.lang.String getApiCreatedTime(ApiTimes apiTimes)
        Get the "created" time from the API response and format it so that only the time (and not date) is returned.
        Parameters:
        apiTimes - ApiTimes object.
        Returns:
        String representing the 24hr time (HH:mm:ss) of the API's "created" time.

      • updateStopForecast

        private void updateStopForecast(StopForecast stopForecast)
        Draw stop forecast to screen.
        Parameters:
        stopForecast - StopForecast object containing data for requested stop.
